sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT score.term, score.score_value FROM score JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.term, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score_value FROM base GROUP BY base.term ORDER BY base.term

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述‘年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）’及 probe_samples 中 class.grade_year 候选值 ['2022', '2024', '2023', '2025']，'22级' 映射为数值 2022；且该字段为精确匹配字段
probe_samples 中 major.major_name 候选值包含精确匹配项 '计算机科学与技术'，且字段描述明确其为专业实体映射主字段
probe_samples 中 class.class_name 候选值包含 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班'，与 grade=2022 和 major='计算机科学与技术' 组合后唯一确定该值；'一班' 是 '1班' 的常见口语化表达，归一化为真实存储值 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班'

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT score.term, score.score_value FROM score JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND score.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.term, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score_value FROM base GROUP BY base.term ORDER BY base.term
